resultUtilities module¶

Created on Mon Apr 1 15:42:47 2020

@author: Pontus Nordqvist @email: p.nordq@gmail.com

class resultUtilities.Report(input_data, output_data)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to present input and output in report form.

add_text(text='')[source]¶

Method to add text to existing repport.

TYPE(text):str, optional

DESCRIPTION. Text to add to the report. The default is “”.

None.

clear()[source]¶

Method to clear the repport i.e set it to an empty string.

None.

class resultUtilities.Visualization(input_data, output_data)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to handle the visualization of the input and output data.

closeAll()[source]¶

Method to close all windows and default the trigger booleans.

None.

showDisplacement()[source]¶

Method to show the displacements. Can also be triggered to show the undisplaced mesh in the same figure.

None.

showElementValues()[source]¶

Method to show the element effective stresses.

None.

showGeometry()[source]¶

Method to show the geometry of the output data.

None.

showMesh()[source]¶

Method to show the mesh of the output data.

None.

wait()[source]¶

Method to make sure that the windows gets updated. It will return when the windows closes.

None.
